name: INACCURATE and OVERWHELMING
description:
A song will start, and you'll have to smash your keyboard... or you'll lose!

Press the key corresponding to the letter which appear in the blue box, just before it changes its color! 

You lose score if you press too late (and earn a bit if you press early)

You have to pay attention!

This game has been created superfast using raylib

for their gamejam "That was close!"

Check the (hastily made) code https://github.com/futureapricot/innacurate-and-overwhelming

----------------

Hey! I am developing more games at https://haremonic-games.itch.io ! It would be cool if you check them out!
